mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COFFEECLASS WHERE CL_STATUS='Y'

SELECT * FROM COFFEECLASS LEFT JOIN (SELECT CLASS_NO , ROUND(AVG(CL_GRADE),1) AS AVGGRADE FROM CL_REVIEW GROUP BY CLASS_NO) USING (CLASS_NO) WHERE CL_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY REGEXP_REPLACE(CLASS_NO, '[0-9]'), TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_REPLACE(CLASS_NO, '[^0-9]')) DESC

SELECT CLASS_NO , C_CODE , CL_NAME , CL_DES , TR_NAME , TR_INTRO , CL_CURI , CL_MAX , CL_DATE , CL_LOCA , CL_PRICE , BLIND , CL_STATUS , BUS_NO , CL_SHORTDES , CL_TIME , CL_TIME2 , CL_TIME3 , CL_LEVEL , CL_RUNTIME , CL_THUMBNAIL , TR_PHOTO , CLASS_PHOTO , CL_WRITER FROM COFFEECLASS WHERE CLASS_NO = #{classNo} ORDER BY CLASS_NO DESC

SELECT CLASS_NO , C_CODE , CL_NAME , CL_DES , TR_NAME , TR_INTRO , CL_CURI , CL_MAX , CL_DATE , CL_LOCA , CL_PRICE , BLIND , CL_STATUS , BUS_NO , CL_SHORTDES , CL_TIME , CL_TIME2 , CL_TIME3 , CL_LEVEL , CL_RUNTIME , CL_THUMBNAIL , TR_PHOTO , CLASS_PHOTO , CL_WRITER , CL_CATEGORY FROM COFFEECLASS WHERE CLASS_NO = #{classNo} ORDER BY CLASS_NO DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE COFFEECLASS SET CL_STATUS = 'D' WHERE CLASS_NO = #{classNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPORT ( REPORT_NO , REPORT_TYPE , REPORT_REASON , ISWARNED , ISCHECKED , REPORTER_ID , ITEM_CODE ) VALUES ( 'CLRP' || CL_REPORT_SEQ.NEXTVAL , #{rpReason} , #{rpDeets} , DEFAULT , DEFAULT , #{reporter} , #{classNo} )
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM COFFEECLASS
AND CL_CATEGORY = #{searchCategory}
AND CL_LOCA LIKE '%' || #{searchLocation} || '%'
ORDER BY CLASS_NO DESC
SELECT C_CODE, C_NAME, C_ADDRESS, C_LA, C_LO, ID, STARTTIME, C_WIFI, C_TOILET, C_PARKING, C_MESSAGE, ENDTIME, MAINPHOTO, PHOTO1, PHOTO2, PHOTO3 FROM CAFE WHERE ID = #{id}
SELECT CL_QNA_NO , USER_ID , CL_QUESTION , CL_ASKDATE , CLASS_NO , CL_ANSWER , CL_STATUS FROM CL_QNA WHERE CLASS_NO = #{classNo}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM NO, A.* FROM ( SELECT CLASS_NO , C_CODE , CL_NAME , CL_DES , TR_NAME , TR_INTRO , CL_CURI , CL_MAX , CL_DATE , CL_LOCA , CL_PRICE , BLIND , CL_STATUS , BUS_NO , CL_SHORTDES , CL_TIME , CL_LEVEL , CL_RUNTIME , CL_THUMBNAIL , TR_PHOTO , CLASS_PHOTO , CL_WRITER FROM COFFEECLASS WHERE CL_STATUS='Y' ORDER BY CLASS_NO DESC) A) WHERE NO > (#{pageNum})-1) * #{pageSize} AND ROWNUM <= #{pageSize}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PAYMENT ( PAY_NO , PAY_ITEM , PAY_PRICE , SUBSCRIBE , PAY_DATE , BUYER_ID , CAFE_RES , AD_CODE , PURCHASE_NUMBER , SUBSCRIBE_CODE , CL_PAY_NO , PAY_DC , PAY_TOTAL , CL_TIME ) VALUES ( 'CLP'||CLP.NEXTVAL , #{list[0].payItem} , #{list[0].payPrice} , NULL , SYSDATE , #{list[0].buyId} , NULL , NULL , NULL , NULL , CLO.CURRVAL , #{list[1]} , #{list[2]} , #{list[0].clTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT CL_REVIEW_NO, CL_PAY_NO, CLASS_NO, CL_GRADE, CL_REVIEW, BLIND, CL_REV_DATE, WRITER_ID FROM CL_REVIEW WHERE CLASS_NO = #{classNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CL_ORDER ( CL_PAY_NO , CLASS_NO ) VALUES ( CLO.NEXTVAL , #{clPayNo} )
